author: Justine Coleman
title: New Mexico governor extends stay-at-home order: 'We're not ready to ease up'
description: New Mexico Gov. Michelle Lujan Grisham (D) extended the state's stay-at-home order Wednesday to last until "at least" May 15.Grisham posted on Twitter that New Mexico's public health emergency or...
